titles.title: A bill to amend the Natural Gas Act to expedite approval of exports of small volumes of natural gas, and for other purposes.
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski under authority of the order of the Senate of 08/01/2019 without amendment. With written report No. 116-73.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 175.

bill.summary:
Small Scale LNG Access Act of 2019
This bill provides that an application for the exportation of natural gas that does not exceed 51.75 billion cubic feet per year shall be deemed consistent with the public interest and granted by the Federal Power Commission without modification or delay.
Applications for exportation of natural gas to any nation subject to sanctions imposed by the United States may not be expedited.
